channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Deputy attorney general seeking meeting with Epstein associate Ghislaine Maxwell
item.description: Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche announced Tuesday that he is seeking a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein's associate Ghislaine Maxwell . The big pictu...

item.title: Coca-Cola will launch cane sugar soda in fall after Trump demand
item.description: Coca-Cola Co. on Tuesday said it plans to launch a new Coke product this fall made with U.S. cane sugar . Why it matters: The move is a response to Pr...

item.title: U.S. again withdraws from UNESCO, citing anti-Israel bias and "woke" causes
item.description: President Trump has again withdrawn the U.S. from the UN Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO). Why it matters: This is the third...

item.title: House Republicans' latest Epstein drama: Panel to subpoena Ghislaine Maxwell
item.description: The House Oversight Committee will subpoena imprisoned Jeffrey Epstein associate Ghislaine Maxwell to testify at a deposition. Why it matters: Rep. Ti...

item.title: Powell should resign to protect Federal Reserve, says top economist
item.description: Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell should step down in order to protect Fed independence , according to Mohamed El-Erian, long one of the bond market...

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Trump’s contract-cutting blitz rattles a once-flourishing DC industry

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
